short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WatchRoom allows many users from different locations to join a room where they can watch the same video together synchronized

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join a WatchRoom with other remote users and watch synchronized videos together!

It is extremely easy to use with no account setup required.

The extension works with most major streaming sites.

How to use:
- Click the extension icon to open the extension UI and turn the power button on
- Share/join the room id with other users who have the extension
- Navigate to a web page with video, and click the "Sync URL" button in the extension UI so other people in the room all go to the same web page
- Watch the video as usual and the extension will sync the video up for all users in the room

Features include:
- Syncing the "play / pause / seek / playback rate" of all users videos in a room
- Syncing the page URL so users can easily be navigated to one users current page
- Status indicators so you know if the extension is or isn't working like the server connection

Current languages supported: (open to adding more)
- English

Current server locations:
- US East
